case_1.title: JAN MUHAMMAD AND 2 OTHERS vs Mst. WALAYAT-UN-NISA

summary.issue_1: Failure of A.C./Collector to decide ejectment suit within 30 days does not render the decree void.
summary.issue_2: Respondent inherited rights from her deceased husband and was entitled to receive rent as a landlord.

key_points.ejectment_rules: Punjab Land Reforms (Procedure for Ejectment Suits) Rules, 1977
key_points.relationship: Landlord and tenant relationship established between parties.

summary.issue_1: Non-exercise of jurisdiction by Additional Commissioner under mistaken belief of repealed ordinance.
summary.issue_2: Duplicate allotment resolved in favor of earlier allotment date.

statutes: West Pakistan Land Revenue Act (X H of 1967)
key_points.decision: Entries in revenue record directed to stand in favor of petitioner.
